about_the_game:
Hello! I'm a solo developer, and I also enjoy creating the art for my games, which adds to the workload but is something I do with a lot of care. If you need any help, find a bug, or have any suggestions, please reach out through the discussion forum or social media! Additionally, I need help with translations, so if you spot anything wrong, please let me know!

Have fun!

Adauto Lino - Joycat Games




  • Game with pixel art graphics and a retro vibe
  • 30 stages divided into five different worlds. Each world has 6 stages, with the last stage of each world being a more challenging hurdle than the others.
  • Wing rental: With money dropped by enemies, you can rent a pair of special wings before starting a new stage. Each pair of wings has a unique ability, such as shields, guided shots, bombs, among others.
  • Special shots: Enemies can drop different shooting modes that can make survival easier, such as magic missiles, triple shots, and sonic shots, among others.
  • Retro gameplay style, reminiscent of classics from the 80s.
  • Easy to learn, hard to master!
  • Some stages provide a more "bullet hell" experience, others will test your flight control skills, and some will present both challenges.
  • Keyboard and controller support. Note: you can keep the shoot button pressed.
  • Original music and sound effects in a retro style so you can focus on the challenges.
  • You can replay previous stages to "farm" money and extra lives.
  • Available in various languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Russian, and Japanese.




Play as a tooth fairy in this shoot'em up (shmup) inspired game. She's always flying forward, and you must use the right and left directional buttons to rotate the flight direction. Shoot magical attacks at rotten teeth and bacteria while dodging traps until you reach the magical portals to advance to the next level.

Note: The game engine I use exports games with a standardized settings menu. You can show or hide this menu by pressing the F1 key on the keyboard.

name: Dental Strike Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A throwback to retro shoot'em up games typical of the 80s, where you play as a tooth fairy fighting against rotten teeth and bacteria using different abilities and special shots.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
